text:
I am a Game Programmer working at IDZ Digital Pvt. Ltd. (Kidloland), where I build interactive mobile experiences for casual players and kids. I specialize in developing polished gameplay, math-driven mechanics, and production-friendly tools using the Unity Game Engine and C#.

I also have prior experience as a Game Programming Faculty at Image Creative Education, where I taught Unity, gameplay logic, and game development fundamentals.

I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science Engineering from Vel Tech Dr. RR & Dr. SR Research and Development Institute of Science and Technology, where I gained a strong foundation in programming and software development.
